sentences.sentence: He has, by submitting his resignation, signalled his unhappiness with the government's decision.
sentences.translation: 他通过递交辞呈已表明对政府决定的不满。

sentences.sentence: Applicants should keep an eye on the deadline for submitting your applications.
sentences.translation: 申请者应该注意提交申请的最后期限。

sentences.sentence: "Of course, I didn't know she couldn't read, so there I was submitting these reports," he said.
sentences.translation: “当然，我不知道她不识字，所以我就提交了这些报告。”他说。
